great game with great friends

The game at it's at this moment I won't recomend buying if you are going to play alone. This game have a lot of buggs that are really annoying and is destroying my experiense when I play alone. This game is funn to play if you have other friends to play together with. The ranking sustem is also terrible at this moment.

But as i say I won't recomend this game as it is today because the bugs that is.
Some of the buggs I usually gets is.
Forcibly getting disconnencted from the game.
Suddenly the game alter itself so ESA starts up and throwing me out of the game compleately and i can't start it up.

These two buggs is the most common for me and it annoys me to experience this because the game if fun and i like playing it but it becomes a hassle that it happens so often that it makes me sad to see the developers not doing anything about it. So do I recomend it yes and no because that depends on if you are going to play it alone or with friends because if you are going to play it with friends i will recomend this game but if you want to play it alone I won't reccomend this game in its current version.

It's rly interestin' gameplay concept & i like to play both survivor and maniac. But there's 1 big problem... I guess that developers don't even test their products coz game have a lot of bugs & unbalanced abilities such as a mori. 
Despite all this I love this game & it's funny to play with friends. Recommended but only with discount.
good

I have been following this game since beta and bought this game since launch. This is my review.
500 hours in and still not bored of this game as there are new killers and map every few months. So returning players and new players have to learn the skills of the killer and how to counter them.
Not to mention they fixed lots of things like buffing some of the killers and improving the hit box and stuff.


The only con about this game is that it is pretty hard to find a lobby at night. It takes about 30 mins - 45 mins to find a lobby. Hope the developer can improve matchmaking.
This game is great, especially when playing with friends. Is there some shitty glitches? Sure... but what game is perfect?

Gra ogólnie spoko ale jest dużo mega wad. Po pierwsze hitboxy są niedowalone bo morderca uderza 2 metry za mną i mnie trafia. Po drugie niektóre postacie są zbyt op i nie mają sensu np. Michael który wbija tier 3 w chwile i zabija na hita do końca gry. To nie ma sensu. Po 3 gra nie jest naprawiana! Dużo ludzi to tryhardy i ludzie którzy wyzywają na chacie. Super. Zamiast naprawiać tą grę to dają skiny za 1000 coś coinsow które kosztuja 548574 zł. Ale ogolnie gra fajna i czuć ten dreszczyk jak goni cie morderca. Gdyby nie tryhardy i bledy gra moglaby być bardzo fajna. Niestety nie jest tak do końca. Jeśli ktoś lubi takie gry to zachęcam do kupna jednakże jeśli łatwo sie denerwujesz i reagujesz to nie polecam. Pozdro :*

A satisfying game play loop,  along with the procedural maps and constant switching of offerings, perks, and add-ons, will keep the game feeling fresh and fun, even 30 hours in! My one gripe is that the game could be a little more polished, but when you're running from the killer or chasing survivors it isn't really much of an issue

У игры очень хрупкий баланс. Чтоб играть было интерсно, обе стороны должны играть "вежливо", что обычно не происходит. 
В итоге имеем сообщество нытиков, которые постоянно жалуются на то, как игра несбалансирована(не в их пользу, разумеется) и как разрабы постоянно только одной стороне потакают(не их, разумеется). 
В итоге эти же люди кемпят с НОЕД'ами, все используют "Орешки" и срут друг друга.
